member.name: IOpenSearchSource.GetResults
member.summary: Returns search results, from an OpenSearch data source, formatted in RSS or Atom format.
member.param: The window handle of the caller.
The query as entered by the user. This parameter is equivalent to the OpenSearch {searchTerms} parameter and may be empty.
The index of the first result being requested. Equivalent to the OpenSearch {startIndex} parameter. See Remarks below.
The number of results being requested. Equivalent to the OpenSearch {count} parameter.
The IID of the interface being requested. Typically IID_IStream.
An interface pointer, of type specified by RIID, to the object containing the results in Atom or RSS format.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise. B_S_ENDOFROWSET optionally signifies the end of the results. The following errors display appropriate error messages in the info bar:

item.description: INET_E_AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED (user does not have permission to access this resource)

member.name: IOpenSearchSource
member.summary: Exposes a method to get search results from a custom client-side OpenSearch data source.
